items.content_text:

*   [Inter (‚≠ê19k)](https://github.com/rsms/inter) - A typeface specially designed for user interfaces

### Iconic fonts / Fonts

*   [Font-Awesome](https://fontawesome.com) - The iconic font and CSS toolkit
*   [openwebicons](https://pfefferle.github.io/openwebicons/) - Because Font Awesome had no RSS-icon and a font with only one icon would be a bit boring

### GitHub Showcases / Event listeners for fonts loading on a web page

items.title: Awesome Fonts Updates on Apr 24 - Apr 30, 2017
items.summary: 24 awesome projects updated on Apr 24 - Apr 30, 2017
items.content_text:
### Emojis / Fonts

*   [alfred-emoji-workflow (‚≠ê636)](https://github.com/carlosgaldino/alfred-emoji-workflow) - Alfred 2 workflow for searching emoji codes
*   [emoji-cheat-sheet.com (‚≠ê6.4k)](https://github.com/WebpageFX/emoji-cheat-sheet.com) - A one pager for emojis on Campfire and GitHub
*   [emoji-data-js (‚≠ê64)](https://github.com/mroth/emoji-data-js) - Emoji encoding swiss army knife for NodeJS
*   [emoji-minesweeper (‚≠ê885)](https://github.com/muan/emoji-minesweeper) - Minesweeper game made with emojis
*   [emoji-regex (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/mathiasbynens/emoji-regex) - A regular expression to match all Emoji-only symbols as per the Unicode Standard
*   [emoji-rspec (‚≠ê173)](https://github.com/cupakromer/emoji-rspec) - Custom Emoji Formatters for RSpec
*   [emoji-translate (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/notwaldorf/emoji-translate) - Translate text to emoji
*   [emoji (‚≠ê304)](https://github.com/leereilly/emoji) - All of the emoji supported on GitHub pull requests, issues, comments, commit messages, markdown files, etc
*   [emoji (‚≠ê2.3k)](https://github.com/muan/emoji) - Find the emoji that echoes your mind
*   [emoji (‚≠ê445)](https://github.com/wpeterson/emoji) - A gem. For Emoji. For everyone.
*   [emojidex (‚≠ê8)](https://github.com/emojidex/emojidex) - Emoji-as-a-service provider and set of tools and assets
*   [emojify (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/mrowa44/emojify) - Emoji on the command line
*   [emojilib (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/muan/emojilib) - Emoji keyword library
*   [emojillate (‚≠ê348)](https://github.com/notwaldorf/emojillate) - Pixellate an image into emoji
*   [emojistatic (‚≠ê97)](https://github.com/mroth/emojistatic) - CDN static asset generation for emoji
*   [emojitracker (‚≠ê741)](https://github.com/mroth/emojitracker) - Track ALL the emoji
*   [gemoji (‚≠ê4.5k)](https://github.com/github/gemoji) - Emoji images and names
*   [gh-emoji (‚≠ê159)](https://github.com/zzarcon/gh-emoji) - Github emoji parsing done right
*   [megamoji (‚≠ê169)](https://github.com/muan/megamoji) - Making megamojis like a pro
*   [mojibar (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/muan/mojibar) - Emoji searcher but as a menubar app
*   [mojime (‚≠ê56)](https://github.com/JuanitoFatas/mojime) - Outputs random emojis
*   [php-emoji (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/iamcal/php-emoji) - A PHP Emoji conversion library
*   [twemoji (‚≠ê17k)](https://github.com/twitter/twemoji) - Twitter Emoji for Everyone
*   [vim-emoji (‚≠ê614)](https://github.com/junegunn/vim-emoji) - Emoji in Vim
items.content_html:
Emojis / Fonts

  • alfred-emoji-workflow (‚≠ê636) - Alfred 2 workflow for searching emoji codes
  • emoji-cheat-sheet.com (‚≠ê6.4k) - A one pager for emojis on Campfire and GitHub
  • emoji-data-js (‚≠ê64) - Emoji encoding swiss army knife for NodeJS

items.title: Awesome Fonts Updates on Mar 06 - Mar 12, 2017
items.summary: 45 awesome projects updated on Mar 06 - Mar 12, 2017
items.content_text:
### General

*   [Fonts In Use](https://fontsinuse.com/) - A public archive of typography

### Free fonts / Collections

*   [Font Squirrel](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/) - A curated collection of free fonts from a variety of foundries
*   [Gidole](http://gidole.github.io/) - Open source, modern DIN
*   [Google Fonts](https://fonts.google.com/)
    *   [Downloader for Google Fonts (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/qrpike/Web-Font-Load)
    *   [Files of Google Fonts (‚≠ê19k)](https://github.com/google/fonts) ([sources](https://github.com/googlefonts))
    *   [Noto Fonts (‚≠ê2.5k)](https://github.com/googlei18n/noto-fonts) - Internationalized font for all languages, with rich support for CJK and emoji
    *   [Roboto (‚≠ê3.8k)](https://github.com/google/roboto) - Default font on Android & ChromeOS, and the recommended typeface for Material Design
*   [The League of Moveable Type](https://www.theleagueofmoveabletype.com/) - The Open-Source Type Movement
    *   [Chunk](https://www.theleagueofmoveabletype.com/chunk)
    *   [Junction](https://www.theleagueofmoveabletype.com/junction)
    *   [League Gothic](https://www.theleagueofmoveabletype.com/league-gothic)
    *   ... And more

### Free fonts / Fonts

*   [Redacted (‚≠ê5.4k)](https://github.com/christiannaths/Redacted-Font) - Keep your wireframes free of distracting Lorem Ipsum
*   [WorkSans (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/weiweihuanghuang/Work-Sans)

### Iconic fonts / Fonts

*   [Appa Sariicon (‚≠ê29)](https://github.com/sariina/appa-sariicon) - 147 8-bit retro style webfont icons form web and mobile
*   [Country Icons (‚≠ê11k)](https://github.com/lipis/flag-icon-css) - A collection of all country flags in SVG and CSS
*   [Evil Icons](http://evil-icons.io/) Simple and clean SVG icon pack with the code to support Rails, Sprockets, Node.js, Gulp, Grunt and CDN
*   [Font Custom (‚≠ê3.3k)](https://github.com/FontCustom/fontcustom) - Icon font generator
*   [font-mfizz (‚≠ê538)](https://github.com/fizzed/font-mfizz) - Vector Icons for Technology and Software Geeks
*   [FontAwesomeKit (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/PrideChung/FontAwesomeKit) - Icon font library for iOS. Currently supports Font-Awesome, Foundation icons, Zocial, and ionicons.
*   [fontello](http://fontello.com) - Iconic fonts scissors
    *   [brandico.font](http://fontello.github.io/brandico.font/demo.html) - Font with logos of social services & messagers
    *   [fontelico.font](http://fontello.github.io/fontelico.font/demo.html) - Open Source iconic font from Fontello project
    *   [typicons.font](http://fontello.github.io/typicons.font/demo.html) - Transformed Typicons
*   [IcoMoon-Free](https://icomoon.io) - A package of flat vector icons together with an installable ligature font
*   [Iconic (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/somerandomdude/Iconic) - Icon set in raster, vector and font formats
*   [icono](https://saeedalipoor.github.io/icono/) - One tag One icon, no font or svg, Pure CSS
*   [ionicons](http://ionicons.com/) - The premium icon font for Ionic
*   [Map Icons (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/scottdejonge/map-icons) - Font for use with Google Maps API and Google Places API using SVG markers and icon labels
*   [Material design icons (‚≠ê52k)](https://github.com/google/material-design-icons) - Official icon set from Google
*   [mfglabs-iconset](http://mfglabs.github.io/mfglabs-iconset/) - Awesome web font icon by MFG Labs
*   [Micon (‚≠ê201)](https://github.com/xtoolkit/Micon) - Iconic Windows 10 font and CSS toolkit
*   [octicons](https://octicons.github.com/) - GitHub's icon font
*   [PE-Analog-Clock-icon-font (‚≠ê301)](https://github.com/jhogue/PE-Analog-Clock-icon-font) - A set of icons for displaying a visual ("analog") representation of time stamps
*   [stackicons (‚≠ê954)](https://github.com/parkerbennett/stackicons) - Icon font and Sass-based construction kit for Stackicons-Social, which supports multiple button shapes and a unique "multi-color" option in CSS for over 60 social brands
*   [svg-icon](https://leungwensen.github.io/svg-icon/) - An ultimate SVG icons collection done right
*   [weather-icons](http://erikflowers.github.io/weather-icons/) - 189 weather themed icons inspired by Font Awesome and ready for Bootstrap
*   [Zocial (‚≠ê189)](https://github.com/adamstac/zocial) - Sass and Compass CSS3 social buttons framework
    *   [CSS social buttons (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/smcllns/css-social-buttons) - Entirely vector-based social buttons

### Programming fonts / Fonts

*   [Adobe Fonts](https://github.com/adobe-fonts)
    *   [Source Code Pro](http://adobe-fonts.github.io/source-code-pro/)
    *   [Source Han Serif (‚≠ê8.7k)](https://github.com/adobe-fonts/source-han-serif)
    *   [Source Sans Pro (‚≠ê3.6k)](https://github.com/adobe-fonts/source-sans-pro)
    *   [Source Serif Pro (‚≠ê2.2k)](https://github.com/adobe-fonts/source-serif-pro)
*   [Codeface (‚≠ê6.3k)](https://github.com/chrissimpkins/codeface) - Gallery of monospaced fonts for developers
*   [Go Fonts](https://blog.golang.org/go-fonts) - Open source fonts from Golang Project
*   [Input](http://input.fontbureau.com) - Flexible system of fonts designed specifically for code
*   [Meslo-Font (‚≠ê2.7k)](https://github.com/andreberg/Meslo-Font) - Customized version of Apple's Menlo font
*   [Nerd Fonts (‚≠ê59k)](https://github.com/ryanoasis/nerd-fonts) - Collection of over 20 patched fonts for Powerline, Font Awesome, Octicons, Devicons, and Vim Devicons

### Programming fonts / Programming fonts with ligatures

*   [FiraCode (‚≠ê79k)](https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode) - Monospaced font with programming ligatures
*   [Fixedsys Excelsior (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/kika/fixedsys)
*   [Iosevka (‚≠ê20k)](https://github.com/be5invis/Iosevka) - Spatially efficient monospace font family for programming. Built from code.
*   [PragmataPro](https://www.fsd.it/shop/fonts/pragmatapro/) - Proprietary font with special ligatures for Haskell, Agda, APL, etc

### JavaScript libs / Programming fonts with ligatures

*   [fontmin (‚≠ê6k)](https://github.com/ecomfe/fontmin) - Font minifier
*   [localFont (‚≠ê847)](https://github.com/jaicab/localFont) - Save fonts in localStorage
*   [opentype.js (‚≠ê4.7k)](https://github.com/nodebox/opentype.js) - Parser and writer for TrueType and OpenType fonts
*   [Typr.js (‚≠ê957)](https://github.com/photopea/Typr.js) - Parser and utility for working with fonts (TTF, OTF)

### Other / Event listeners for fonts loading on a web page

*   [Font Squirrel Webfont Generator](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/tools/webfont-generator) - Upload OTF or TTF fonts, receive webfonts
*   [FontForge (‚≠ê7.1k)](https://github.com/fontforge/fontforge) - Cross-platform font editor
*   [Powerline Fonts (‚≠ê26k)](https://github.com/powerline/fonts) - Patched fonts for Powerline users
items.content_html:
